scripts.test:webpack1: npm install -q webpack@1.x && npm run test:clean && webpack --config test/webpack1.config.js
scripts.test:webpack2: npm install -q webpack@2.x && npm run test:clean && webpack --config test/webpack2.config.js
scripts.test:webpack3: npm install -q webpack@3.x && npm run test:clean && webpack --config test/webpack2.config.js
scripts.test:webpack4: npm install -q webpack@4.x webpack-cli && npm run test:clean && webpack --config test/webpack4.config.js
scripts.test: npm run test:webpack1 && npm run test:webpack2 && npm run test:webpack3 && npm run test:webpack4
